issue.title: [CF 695] Help popup tutorial of sorts for conditions
issue.body:
For example, when a user first enters the condition tab, show a tip for the add condition button, then for the choose type menu. Also show a tip once they add two conditions for the and/or toggle, and once they have three conditions for parentheses.

Also consider this tutorial system for the events tab.

On a semi-related note, make sure parentheses are properly discarded when dropping from 3 conditions down to 2


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #695 | Raw
